file.name: api.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Evian
  description: Documentation for Evian
servers:
  - url: /api/v1
tags:
  - name: Auth
    description: Authentication endpoints
  - name: User
    description: User endpoints
  - name: Charging Point
    description: Charging Point endpoints
  - name: Station
    description: Station endpoints
  - name: Booking
    description: Booking endpoints

paths:
  /auth/getUserDetails:
    get:
      tags:
        - Auth
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Get user details
      description: Get user details
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetUserDetailsResponse'
  /auth/signupUser:
    post:
      tags:
        - Auth
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Signup a new user
      description: Signup a new user
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SignupUser'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessResponse'
  /auth/signupStation:
    post:
      tags:
        - Auth
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Signup a new station
      description: Signup a new station
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SignupStation'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessResponse'
  /user/updateProfilePicture:
    put:
      tags:
        - User
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Update user profile picture
      description: Update user profile picture
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateProfilePicture'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessResponse'
  /user/bookings:
    get:
      tags:
        - User
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Get user bookings
      description: Get user bookings
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetUserBookingsResponse'
  /chargingPoint/bookedSlots/{stationId}/{index}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Charging Point
      summary: Get charging point's booked slots
      description: Get charging point's booked slots
      parameters:
        - name: stationId
          in: path
          description: id of the station
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: index
          in: path
          description: index of charging point
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetBookedSlotsResponse'
  /station/{stationId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Station
      summary: Get station details
      description: Get station details
      parameters:
        - name: stationId
          in: path
          description: The id of station whose details is to be retrieved
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetStationDetailsResponse'
  /station/{state}/{city}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Station
      summary: Get all station details
      description: Get all stations of a particular state and city
      parameters:
        - name: state
          in: path
          description: The state whose stations are to be retrieved
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: city
          in: path
          description: The city whose stations are to be retrieved
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetAllStationDetailsResponse'
  /station/bookings:
    get:
      tags:
        - Station
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Get station bookings
      description: Get station bookings
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GetStationBookingsResponse'
  /station/updateAddress:
    put:
      tags:
        - Station
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Update station address and location
      description: Update station address and location
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/UpdateAddress'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessResponse'
  /station/chargingPoints:
    post:
      tags:
        - Station
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Add charging points to a station
      description: Add charging points to a station
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AddChargingPoints'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessResponse'
    put:
      tags:
        - Station
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Update charging points of a station
      description: Update charging points of a station
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AddChargingPoints'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessResponse'
  /booking/initializeBooking:
    post:
      tags:
        - Booking
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Initialize a booking
      description: Initialize a booking
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitializeBooking'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InitializeBookingResponse'
  /booking/verifyBooking:
    post:
      tags:
        - Booking
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Verify a booking
      description: Verify a booking
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/VerifyBooking'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessResponse'
  /booking/{bookingId}:
    put:
      tags:
        - Booking
      security:
        - Bearer: []
      summary: Update a booking status
      description: Update a booking status
      responses:
        200:
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SuccessResponse'
components:
  securitySchemes:
    Bearer:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      description: Provide a valid JWT token
  schemas:
    GetUserDetailsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
        createdAt:
          type: object
          properties:
            _seconds:
              type: number
            _nanoseconds:
              type: number
        city:
          type: string
        state:
          type: string
        phone:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        profilePicture:
          type: string
    SignupUser:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - email
        - state
        - city
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        phone:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        state:
          type: string
        city:
          type: string
    SignupStation:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - email
        - address
        - location
        - state
        - city
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        phone:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        address:
          type: string
        location:
          type: string
        state:
          type: string
        city:
          type: string
    UpdateProfilePicture:
      type: object
      required:
        - imageUrl
      properties:
        imageUrl:
          type: string
    GetUserBookingsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        bookings:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              id:
                type: string
              stationName:
                type: string
              address:
                type: string
              slots:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: number
              createdAt:
                type: object
                properties:
                  _seconds:
                    type: number
                  _nanoseconds:
                    type: number
              chargingPoint:
                type: number
              totalAmount:
                type: number
              status:
                type: string
    GetBookedSlotsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        bookedSlots:
          type: array
          items:
            type: number
    GetStationDetailsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        address:
          type: string
        location:
          type: string
        chargingPoints:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              index:
                type: number
              capacity:
                type: number
              cost:
                type: number
    GetAllStationDetailsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        stations:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              id:
                type: string
              name:
                type: string
              address:
                type: string
              numberOfChargingPoints:
                type: number
              minCost:
                type: number
              maxCost:
                type: number
    GetStationBookingsResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        bookings:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              userId:
                type: string
              userName:
                type: string
              stationId:
                type: string
              orderId:
                type: string
              vehicleNumber:
                type: string
              paid:
                type: boolean
              stationName:
                type: string
              address:
                type: string
              slots:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: number
              createdAt:
                type: object
                properties:
                  _seconds:
                    type: number
                  _nanoseconds:
                    type: number
              chargingPoint:
                type: number
              totalAmount:
                type: number
              status:
                type: string
    UpdateAddress:
      type: object
      required:
        - address
        - location
      properties:
        address:
          type: string
        location:
          type: string
    AddChargingPoints:
      type: object
      required:
        - chargingPoints
      properties:
        chargingPoints:
          type: array
          items:
            type: object
            properties:
              index:
                type: number
              capacity:
                type: number
              cost:
                type: number
    SuccessResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string
    InitializeBooking:
      type: object
      required:
        - stationId
        - vehicleNumber
        - chargingPoint
        - slots
        - charges
      properties:
        stationId:
          type: string
        vehicleNumber:
          type: string
        chargingPoint:
          type: number
        slots:
          type: array
          items:
            type: number
        charges:
          type: number
    InitializeBookingResponse:
      type: object
      properties:
        orderId:
          type: string
        bookingId:
          type: string
    VerifyBooking:
      type: object
      required:
        - razorpayPaymentId
        - razorpaySignature
        - orderId
        - bookingId
      properties:
        razorpayPaymentId:
          type: string
        razorpaySignature:
          type: string
        orderId:
          type: string
        bookingId:
          type: string

Error: parse: paths: /booking/{bookingId}: put: operation "": parse path: path parameter not specified: "bookingId"
